title: His Voice, His Song, His Lure
description: This short read is part of the Dream Chronicles, they are a series of short snappy tales straight from the nocturnal thoughts of the author.Lanie is fresh out of a controlling relationship. She's been out of touch with reality for a couple of years but is very slowly adjusting to her life. Her best friend, Frankie, drags an unwilling Lanie to a concert. Lanie has never heard of "Two States To Mind" or the lead singer James Luruso. Before the concert starts she gets talking to Jay, one of the staff, and thereâ€™s an instant attraction. Lannie gets the shock of her life when she discovers who Jay really is and a surprising and unlikely turn of events follows.
author: Riley Steel
